description:
VM Brasseur

What if money isn't the only way to create sustainable free and open source software projects? What if it turns out that sustainability is actually a multi-faceted concept that can't truly be successful if people focus on only one of its many elements?

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/vicky

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sun Aug  4 09:20:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
title: The real costs of Open Source Sustainability
